panels.description: Einspeisevergütung und besonders die zugekauften Energiekosten sind hier Näherungen mit potentiell hoher Ungenauigkeit! (Integrale mit lückenhaften Daten)

targets.query: SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000 GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value >= 0 GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value")  / -3600 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000 GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value")  / -3600 FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000 GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value")  /3600 FROM "gridPower" WHERE "value" < 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)

panels.title: Energie/30 Tage

panels.description: Autarkie und Eigenverbrauch sind hier Näherungen mit potentiell hoher Ungenauigkeit! (Integrale mit lückenhaften Daten)

targets.query: SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value >= 0 GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30d) fill(none)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000  GROUP BY time(30d) fill(none)
SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "pvPower" WHERE id='' AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value")  /(-3600) FROM "gridPower" WHERE "value" < 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)

panels.title: Kennzahlen/30 Tage

targets.query: SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "pvPower" WHERE  id='' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)

panels.description: Einspeisevergütung ist hier eine Näherung mit potentiell hoher Ungenauigkeit! (Integrale mit lückenhaften Daten)

targets.query: SELECT integral("value")  / -3600 FROM "gridPower" WHERE ("value"::field < 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)

panels.title: Höchste Einspeisungen

targets.query: SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "homePower" WHERE ("value"::field < 10000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "chargePower" WHERE ("value"::field < 10000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value >= 0 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value >= 0 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)

panels.description: Zugekaufte Energiekosten ist hier eine Näherung mit potentiell hoher Ungenauigkeit! (Integrale mit lückenhaften Daten)

targets.query: SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value <10000 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value >= 0 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)

panels.title: Energie/Tag

targets.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT min("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE $timeFilter AND value  > 0 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
